page.title: 17FAMILY LIFE IN BRAILES
page.content: I live in Jeffs Close with my mum,dad and little brother.My dad is a Toolroom Grinder and my mum is a School Meals Supervisor.My brother and I go to Brailes C.E. Primary School. Nan and Gramp live just round the corner.Our other grandparents live in Chipping Campden. We often go for walks and bike rides,or go out in the car.We have two pets,one is a rabbit,the other is a budgerigar.Tea in our house is about 5.30p.m.Afterwards I usually go out to play with my friends. Our family get on fairly well together,but sometimes my brother and I argue.At the weekend we have lots of fun indoors and outdoors,playing mostly board games inside,and tennis,badminton,cricket and lots more enjoyable things outside.
